group_1.narration: Brought to You By@Chinese Restaurant Banbanzai
This is the tale of the [textRed:Smiley Kingdom].
In a place far beyond the horizon@where the sun rises...
In the farthest reaches of the east...
There was a kingdom whose@people were always smiling.

group_1.textLeft: That Ferris wheel was fun! Where should we@go next?

group_1.textCenter: Let's ride the Ferris wheel again!

group_1.textRight: Good idea. I'm tired of walking.

group_1.narration: Everyone in the kingdom lived together@peacefully in this paradise of dreams.
It was truly a utopia on earth.
Until the [textRed:time] devouring monster appeared.
Nobody knew much about it.@They simply called it...@"The Invisible Demon".
Once the monster began devouring time...
A single day was reduced to 23 hours.@Then 17... Then 12...
The days grew shorter and shorter.@So many hours were lost to that monster.

group_1.textCenter: It's getting late, I need to get home.

group_1.textLeft: I can't believe it's this late already.

group_1.narration: Just then, a heroine stood up@to save the Smiley Kingdom.
The mightiest of them all...
[textRed:Tsuruno].

group_1.textCenter: [chara:100300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!
Hang on. I only slept for 11 hours.
But in another hour it's gonna be tomorrow?
Hmmm, if I relax any longer...
I won't be able to relax ever again!
Welp... Time to go on a journey.
Gotta vanquish the monster who devours time!
[chara:100300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait...
But... Isn't it invisible?
How the heck will I find it?

group_1.narration: In the Smiley Kingdom lived two sisters...@They were called "[textRed:the Guardians of Time]".

group_1.textCenter: Yep, those two might know something!
That's what my gut's telling me!

group_1.narration: Tsuruno first went to visit the two sisters@in the clock tower where they lived.

group_1.textLeft: A journey to defeat the Invisible Monster?

group_1.textCenter: B-but... If you want our help...

group_1.textRight: I don't know what's going on...
But I never back down from a fight!

group_1.narration: The Guardians of Time sisters@wanted to test Tsuruno's powers.
They challenged her@to a two-on-one battle.

group_1.textCenter: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][surround:1004A04]H-hyah!

group_1.narration: But Tsuruno did not give up...
For she was the "Mightiest Girl".

group_1.textRight: All right! Time to bring out the big guns!

group_1.textCenter: Wh-what?!

group_1.narration: — Tsuruno —@Behold my ultimate form!@[textRed:Super Tsuruno Mark II]:!
— Tsuruno —@Ka-ching!
— Guardian of Time —@Wh-whaaat?!
— Guardian of Time —@She literally just said "ka-ching"!
The Mightiest Girl Tsuruno@fused together with her@pocket minion doll.
She then powered up into@"Super Tsuruno Mark II"!

group_1.textRight: All right, back to our battle!

group_1.textLeft: Fine! If you're transformin', I will too!

group_1.textCenter: M-me too...
I-I'm Sana!
Um, weren't we fighting about something@[chara:100400:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:100400:lipSynch_1]completely different...?
